org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph

Class GraphItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph.GraphItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Arc, Node

    public abstract class GraphItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Super class for nodes and arcs. Convenient super class to define listeners for common events of nodes and arcs, such as agent arrival and departures.
